intro.text: You've just finished walking through the grocery store. You're tired, but you found everything you wanted on your shopping list.

checkout-start.text: There are only two open cashiers, both with a long line of people. You pick the shortest one, and wait.

waiting.text: The line grows behind you, as the second cashier has closed.

cashier.text: You finally get to the front of the line. The cashier is tired, and hurriedly scans and pack your items into grocery bags.

paying.text: She runs up all the items before you get a chance to look over the prices. When she asks for your method of payment, you realize the total cost is more than the money you have left on your SNAP card. You don't have any extra cash with you. You get nervous, as the line behind you keeps getting longer.

options.description: Ask the cashier if she has any coupons.
Apologize, and ask to take out some items.

coupons.text: The person behind you coughs. The cashier shakes her head, and asks again how you'd like to pay for your food.

options.description: Apologize, and ask to take out some items.

give-up.text: The cashier isn't happy to hear that she'll have to put all of the food you didn't purchase away, and hurriedly moves on to the next customer. As you walk away, you remember that you'll have to find something for your two children to eat for dinner.

shopping-cart.text: Here are all of the items in your shopping cart.

shopping-cart-items.description: A gallon of Shaws-Brand Whole Milk
shopping-cart-items.notes: Kids need the calcium and vitamin D in milk. But on top of that, Paul has been having trouble sleeping recently, and a glass of milk before bed helps him sleep.
shopping-cart-items.name: Whole milk

shopping-cart-items.notes: It's not as healthy as organic greek yogurt, but the kids need something for their snack time at school. The past few weeks, they haven't been taking anything.
shopping-cart-items.name: Yogurt

shopping-cart-items.notes: Protein rich - a healthy option for the childens' snacktime at school
shopping-cart-items.name: Greek Yogurt

shopping-cart-items.description: A Macaroni and Cheese Meal that Serves 3
shopping-cart-items.notes: Working a 10 hour day is exhausting, and this would save Alexa a great deal of time from cooking which she instead use to spend time with her children
shopping-cart-items.name: Frozen macaroni and cheese

shopping-cart-items.description: A large bag of frozen corn, peas, and carrots
shopping-cart-items.notes: It's important to get vegetables, and while these aren't as healthy or tasty as fresh vegetables, they do save Alexa the time of cutting the vegetables. But, it has been hard to get Paul and Sophie to eat the vegetables - they tend to throw them away.
shopping-cart-items.name: Mixed vegetables

shopping-cart-items.notes: The past two months, the family has been eating cereal for breakfast. The kids (and Alexa) have been getting sick of it, so this would be a nice treat to start the day
shopping-cart-items.name: Frozen waffles

shopping-cart-items.notes: A summer treat and Sophie's favourite flavor. Bringing this home would make the kids really happy, especially since you haven't been able to spend as much time with them lately.
shopping-cart-items.name: Hood Ice Cream

shopping-cart-items.notes: All you have to do is put this in the microwave and boom! Instant dinner. This is a quick way to feed the kids while running on a tight schedule.
shopping-cart-items.name: Healthy Choice Frozen Dinner

shopping-cart-items.notes: Paul inhales these like they're air and Sophie loves taking them for her school snacks.
shopping-cart-items.name: Cole's Cheesesticks

shopping-cart-items.notes: This would be a quick and convenient snack for the family. However, it's quite pricy.
shopping-cart-items.name: Apples

shopping-cart-items.notes: While expensive, the kids really like mango slices for desert and school snacks.
shopping-cart-items.name: Mango

shopping-cart-items.description: A pound of sweet Italian Cubanelle peppers
shopping-cart-items.notes: These look nice, but you doesn't know when she'll have the time to actually cook them in something.
shopping-cart-items.name: Mini sweet peppers

shopping-cart-items.description: A 12 oz bag of green beans
shopping-cart-items.notes: Cooking you into a dish may be hard, but Alexa thinks she may be able to steam them. Would the kids eat it though is the real question.
shopping-cart-items.name: Green beans

shopping-cart-items.description: A 5lb bag of Florida Red Potatoes
shopping-cart-items.notes: Cooking these will take some time, but the kids always like your potatoes.
shopping-cart-items.name: Potatoes

shopping-cart-items.notes: These are pricy, but your absolute favorite fruit. You've been working really hard lately, don't you deserve a treat?
shopping-cart-items.name: Raspberries

shopping-cart-items.notes: This would make for great sandwiches. Sophie strongly dislikes the school lunches, but has been eating them because she is a good sport. Buying her some sandwich supplies would make her very happy.
shopping-cart-items.name: Ham

shopping-cart-items.notes: In addition to being a necessity for sandwiches, this cheese makes a gerat snack on its own.
shopping-cart-items.name: American Cheese

shopping-cart-items.notes: All natural. The kids always love your chicken, only problem is finding the time to cook it. You don't even get home from work until after 6pm.
shopping-cart-items.name: Chicken

shopping-cart-items.notes: Put some bacon in your vegetables will make the kids a lot more likely to eat them.
shopping-cart-items.name: Bacon

shopping-cart-items.notes: Sophie would enjoy baking these, and then you would have breakfast/snacks for a few days too.
shopping-cart-items.name: Muffin Mix

shopping-cart-items.notes: The kids will be disappointed if they don't have frosting for the muffins.
shopping-cart-items.name: Frosting

shopping-cart-items.notes: These are Sophie's favorite chips.
shopping-cart-items.name: Kettle Potato Chips

shopping-cart-items.notes: These are Paul's favorite chips.
shopping-cart-items.name: Doritos

shopping-cart-items.notes: These are your favorite chips.
shopping-cart-items.name: El Sabroso Tortilla Chips

shopping-cart-items.notes: Everyone in the family likes apple juice. Without this, there will be nothing to balance the dryness of the chips in your mouth.
shopping-cart-items.name: Apple Juice
